title: Deal with the Devil
content:
with Raphael

We found Raphel's servant Korrile on the ground floor of Sharess' Caress. She told us her master awaits us on the top floor.

Deal with the Devil Walkthrough

In Sharess' Caress, proceed to another room on the 2nd floor at X:-14 Y:105 and engage a conversation with Raphael. He's pleased to see you and snaps his fingers to clear your mind. Initiate a conversation using the following responses:

Did you just rid me of the tadpole with a snap of your fingers? I feel... empty. What di
